summary: This is an email chain from September 2019 regarding the status of the taint review of materials seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence. The emails are between law enforcement personnel, discussing the need for an update on the review process for a meeting with the ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge).

events.title: Materials from Epstein's residence made available
events.description: Materials seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence were made available for review.

keyFacts: A taint review of materials seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence was underway as of September 2019.
The seized materials were made available for review on September 10, 2019.
Law enforcement supervisors requested a status update on the taint review process for a meeting with the ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge).
The email indicates coordination between agents on the Epstein case and those handling the taint review.
The correspondence shows ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein's case after his death.
